TopicTitle: Anyone remember a mod with inflatable fuel tanks?

Articles.Content:
I had a mod with an inflatable fuel tank in an older version of KSP, maybe 4 years, ago and I can't remember the name.

 I've deleted all my old KSP save files, so I can't go back and find the mod. Anyone remember a mod with inflatable fuel tanks?
What did the tanks look like?  There's been a few.  MKS has some I know, but they aren't the only one.

2 minutes ago, DStaal said:

What did the tanks look like?  There's been a few.  MKS has some I know, but they aren't the only one.

They were rectangular, with rounded edges. When they were fully expanded, they sort of looked like an inflated sleeping bag. I think the mod I was using only had this one inflatable part.

10 hours ago, KingMonkeyNuts said:

They were rectangular, with rounded edges. When they were fully expanded, they sort of looked like an inflated sleeping bag. I think the mod I was using only had this one inflatable part.

That sounds like the ones from MKS/USI.  I'll admit I'm not sure which of RoverDude's mods they're actually in - I think MKS however.
It was MKS. Thanks for the tip.
